content.p: Write down a formula for a function which is a power function but is not a polynomial function.
Write down a formula for a function which is a polynomial function but is not a power function.
Write down a formula for a function which is both a polynomial and a power function.

outtro.p: Power functions that are not polynomials look like f(x) = x^p, where p is not a positive whole number. f(x) = x^{-3}, f(x) = \frac{1}{x}, f(x) = x^{\frac{3}{2}}, and f(x) = \sqrt{x} are all good examples.
Any polynomial with more than one non-zero term is not a power function. g(x) = 5x^2 + 3x - 1 is a good example.
Polynomials with one non-zero term are also power functions. h(x) = x^3 is a good example.
